name: getLastCriticalCareDailyAssessmentCOVIDAllPatients
description: Get the last compositon for each patient for Critical Care Daily Assessment COVID

steps.processorData:
select
    a/name/value,
    a/context/start_time/value as created,
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as authority,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/value/value as Assessment_Date,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value/value as Critical_Care_Admission_Date,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0073]/value/value as Symptom_Onset_Date,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0074]/value/value as Level_of_Care,
    -- a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0007]/value/value as First_intubation_date,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0137]/value/value as First_intubation_date,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0155]/value/value as extubation_date,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0009]/value/value as Current_PF_Ratio,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0014]/value/magnitude as FiO2,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0017]/value/value as Positive_end_expiratory_pressure_PEEP,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0038]/value/value as Prone,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0039]/value/value as Paralysed,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0040]/value/value as Spontaneous_or_Mandatory_Mode,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0044]/value/magnitude as Ppeak_cmH2O,
    -- a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0045]/value/value as Suitable_for_re_intubation,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0156]/value/value as Suitable_for_re_intubation,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0048]/value/value as Resuscitation_Status,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0102]/value/value as Resp_Dysfunction,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0103]/value/value as CVS_Dysfunction,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0104]/value/value as CNS_Dysfunction,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0105]/value/value as Renal_Dysfunction,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0072]/value/magnitude as Fluid_balance_at_08_00,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0097]/value/magnitude as Acuity_Score,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0057]/value/magnitude as Age,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0058]/value/value as Gender,
    squash(a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0062]/value/value) as Co_morbidities,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0063]/value/value as Presumed_or_Superimposed_Bacterial_Infection,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0064]/value/value as Lymphocyte_has_been_0_8,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0067]/value/value as Platelets_has_been_100,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0122]/value/value as CRP_has_been_125,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0123]/value/value as Troponin_has_been_raised,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0124]/value/magnitude as Risk_Count,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0054]/items[at0055]/value/magnitude as Risk_Score
from EHR e contains
top 1
COMPOSITION a
contains EVALUATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.critical_care_daily_assessment_covid.v0]
where
    a/archetype_details/template_id/value='Critical Care Daily Assessment COVID'
order by created desc
offset 0 limit 10000
